mapper.select: SELECT XPORNUM, ZORG, XSTATUSPOR, XDATE FROM POORDHEADER JOIN ZBUSINESS ON ZBUSINESS.ZID=POORDHEADER.ZID WHERE ZBUSINESS.CENTRALZID=#{zid} AND TO_CHAR(XDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')=#{xdate} AND XTYPE='Requisition Order' AND ZBUSINESS.BRANCH='1' AND POORDHEADER.ZACTIVE='1' AND POORDHEADER.XSTATUSPOR='Open'
